title: Cop cops it after Copilot cops out: West Midlands police chief quits over AI hallucination

title: Top Tech News Today | Threads Beats X, Sequoia Bets on AI, iOS 27 Buzz, Musk Lawsuit
description: From Threads overtaking X on mobile to Sequoia’s bold AI bet and Elon Musk’s lawsuit, here are today’s biggest tech headlines.

title: ASUS Confirms To Stop Launch Of New Mobile Phones And Plans To Go 'All In AI'
description: The Taiwanese company assures that existing ZenFone and ROG owners will receive after-sales support, including maintenance, software upgrades, and warranty services.

title: Silicon Valley-based FaiBLE Media launches with focus on AI storytelling in India
description: Silicon Valley startup FaiBLE Media Inc. has launched with a mission to decode the science of storytelling using AI. Co-founded by Sharad Devarajan and Dr. Mark Sagar, the company aims to develop new media experiences, including 'Quantum Stories' that offer non-linear narrative paths. FaiBLE seeks to identify scientific patterns behind emotional resonance in stories, inspired by scientific breakthroughs like AlphaFold.

title: Gemini vs ChatGPT: Here Are 5 Simple Hacks I Tried To Create Best AI Images For Free
description: From reference photos to Pro mode, these easy tricks helped me generate professional AI visuals without paying anything extra.
